answers.answer: I had preeclampsia with my first child. Don't be scared your doctor will just monitor you closely. Take things easy so you don't make your blood pressure rise. Everything will be fine.
I'm sure you'll be fine, my friend was 33 weeks when she had to have an emergency c-section due to pre eclampsia and both mum and baby were fine x
Has anyone had to do a 24 urine collect?

They are just checking to make sure everything is fine when they do a 24 hour urine check. My preeclampsia happened last minute and when they checked my urine it had a lot of protein so that same day they induced me. I had a vaginal delivery still. They are checking your urine for signs of how severe the preeclampsia is.
I'm just scared because this is my first baby and I have never had any problems until now. I don't want to lose my son.

question: I just found out that I could have preeclampsia:( I'm really scared
title: preeclampsia
